message.content:
cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a SLAM system that can handle multiple disconnected sub-maps and merge them seamlessly, which is a problem in robotics (cs.RO). The system uses ORBSLAM, a visual SLAM algorithm that relies on wide-baseline matching and non-linear optimization, which involves computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also proposes a new criteria for detecting lost tracking, which involves reasoning about the geometry of the scene, which is related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and control systems (cs.SY). Overall, the paper covers multiple areas of computer science, but robotics and computer vision seem to be the most relevant ones.
